concept-wr.title: Titanium Server CPE Solution
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server can be deployed on a system consisting of just two nodes, one active and one redundant.

conbody.p: In the Titanium Server CPE (Customer Premises Equipment) solution, each node implements controller, storage, and compute functions, and provides virtual machine hosting. This provides an ideal system for consolidating a small set of standalone server-based products, which may have various operating systems, networking requirements, and so on, into a simple and compact physical solution that offers ease of deployment, high availability, resource autoscaling, and other benefits of a cloud implementation.
